message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $9,500.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. That's the price you mentioned you're willing to sell it for, and I think it's a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  However, I know the value of this product and $8,000 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept.  Could you do $9,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but I'm trying to be responsible with my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $8,500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring me.
